reviewText: Not in English but you'll get the gist.  If you love Belle poque artists and Montmartre, you'll enjoy this film.

I understand from reviews elsewhere that this is an excellent film.  What is not clear from the listing is that it probably is in French with Spanish subtitles.  If you don't speak either language you might hesitate about purchasing it.  I was hoping this would be released with English subtitles but so far it hasn't.
